version_description:
11月除了大买特买，也别忘了学点英文欧。

EF Hello团队绞尽脑汁为你呈现：
- 好东西不藏私~~在社群媒体分享你对EF Hello的爱吧！
- 金鱼脑救星~~让你一键重置帐户密码。
我们还打击了一堆臭虫......

又到了月底，一起来冲刺学点英文吧。
- 新增可爱的幽默动画，绝对让你边学边笑，不信？赶快进来瞧瞧。
- 我们继续打击臭虫...

- 新增可爱的幽默动画，绝对让你边学边笑，不信？赶快进来瞧瞧。
- 我们继续打击臭虫...

- 新增可爱的幽默动画，绝对让你边学边笑，不信？赶快进来瞧瞧。
- 我们继续打击臭虫...

成功晋级画面更新。
效能和稳定性大幅升级。
臭虫特攻队一刻也没休息～

效能和稳定性大幅升级。

Hello 团队给大家拜年了，感谢你的支持和鼓励！
我们在假期加班加点，只为给你带来以下激动人心的新功能：
1. 全新的学员 ID 界面，方便跟踪你的学习进度
2. 全新的翻译切换功能，让你更容易理解我们的课程内容
3. 全新的人工智能 AI 语音评分系统，帮助你练习发音技巧
4. 其他性能更新和错误修复
Today we're bringing you a detailed view of each level within the app :)

In this release we have been working on:
1. General bugs and performance upgrades
2. Secret surprises for our long time users (´ε｀ )
Hello From Team Hello in London :) Hope everyone is having a great start to work or school after Chinese New Years.

Happy International Women’s Day!

To celebrate, we are bring you a brand new update:
1. A brand new way to track your progress with our progress graph
2. General bug fixes and performance upgrades

Keep Learning and thank you for your support!
General bug fixes and performance upgrades(　･`ω･´)
General bug fixes and performance upgrades(　･`ω･´)

Hello from Team Hello in London!

This week we are bringing you:
1. General bug fixes
2. Daily surprises for our hardcore users :)

Hello from Team Hello in London!

This week we are bringing you:
1. General bug fixes
2. Daily surprises for our hardcore users :)

Hello from London!
For this week:
1. Massive improvements to our pronunciation exercises
2. General bug fixes
Thanks for your support

Happy Easter from London! This week we're excited to bring you:
1. Check in - a new way to keep up your motivation for learning English
2. New Language Buddy introduction
3. Ability to update your username & birthday if you want

Happy Easter from London! This week we're excited to bring you:
1. Check in - a new way to keep up your motivation for learning English
2. New Language Buddy introduction
3. Ability to update your username & birthday if you want

This week we are bringing you:
1. A brand new way to remind you to study :)
2. General bug fixes and performance improvements

Bug fixes
Performance and stability upgrades

This week we're bringing you:
1) A way to track how likely you are to become a proficient English speaker based on how often and how much you study
2) An update to course view on the home screen - you'll now know at a glance exactly where you are

This week we're very excited to bring you the EF Hello Apple Watch app now available on a wrist near you.
This week we're very excited to bring you the EF Hello Apple Watch app now available on a wrist near you.
This week we're very excited to bring you the EF Hello Apple Watch app now available on a wrist near you.
This week we worked hard on squashing some bugs and are delighted to make EF Hello even more helpful with a new FAQ section
This week we are super excited to bring you a flashy new navigation design in the form of a tab bar. The team has also been hard at work fixing pesky bugs.
We've been working hard on fixing some annoying bugs while we've got some exciting bigger things in the pipeline for soon.

We're thrilled to bring you Hello +PLUS, our premium offering. Hello +PLUS includes access to personal A.I. coaches to target your English difficulties, a review notebook containing personalized learning summaries and the ability to tap on any message in the Course to access English definitions from your own digital suite of Oxford English Dictionaries and translations too.

This week we're excited to release a bunch of features for our EF Hello +PLUS members including fantastic personal study guidance and even iPad support. As always we've been hard at work eliminating a few more bugs.
The team has worked hard this week to offer an improved Dictionary experience for our EF Hello +PLUS members. We've also been tackling those pesky bugs.
We've been working hard on fixing some annoying bugs this week and implementing some general improvements.

We're thrilled to bring you Hello+TEACHERS, our premium offering with all the Hello+ study tools and A.I Coaches and the bonus of real native English-speaking teachers! +TEACHERS allows you to ask unlimited English questions via live chat with answers from a real teacher anytime, 24/7!

We can happily say that EF Hello now also offers private 1:1 video coaching with a teacher at key points in your learning path!

We hope you're as excited as we are. Our teachers can't wait to meet you!

We're thrilled to bring you Hello+TEACHERS, our premium offering with all the Hello+ study tools and A.I Coaches and the bonus of real native English-speaking teachers! +TEACHERS allows you to ask unlimited English questions via live chat with answers from a real teacher anytime, 24/7!

We can happily say that EF Hello now also offers private 1:1 video coaching with a teacher at key points in your learning path!

We hope you're as excited as we are. Our teachers can't wait to meet you!

This week we're happy to share with you:
* Study recommendations now within Course. These are based on your learning history and with one quick tap you can immediately start your suggested study activity

This week we're happy to share with you:
* A way to bookmark words in the Dictionary that you want to learn. Your Vocabulary Coach will include these words in your practice
* Subtitles for audio clips! You can access subtitles by tapping on the new magnifying glass icon on each audio clip

This week we're happy to share with you:
* A way to bookmark words in the Dictionary that you want to learn. Your Vocabulary Coach will include these words in your practice
* Subtitles for audio clips! You can access subtitles by tapping on the new magnifying glass icon on each audio clip

* A dedicated Language Buddy matching bot
* A way to find your English Level through your Profile tab

This week we're happy to share with you:
* Practice pronouncing the specific words you find difficult using the new phoneme practice feature
* Your review Notebook has a new look and is better than ever!
* Even more information in your Dictionary

This week we're happy to share with you:
* A new look to your Course screen. You'll clearly see how quickly you progress through the EF Hello course
* We've been working hard on fixing some annoying bugs and implementing some general improvements.

This week we're happy to share with you:
* New progress overview so you can clearly see how you are progressing through your Course
* A new and improved 'Ask a Teacher' experience for our Teacher Pro users
We've been working hard on fixing some annoying bugs this week and implementing some general improvements.

This week we're happy to share with you:
* A dedicated keyboard area in Course to make selecting your answers easier
* We've been working hard on squashing annoying bugs and implementing some general improvements.

This week we're very happy to bring a new look to your EF Hello app:
* Homescreen is dedicated to accessing your course
* Review tab has all your review materials including your notebooks and personalised practice
* Teacher tab for asking teachers all your questions. This now suggests questions you might find helpful to start a conversation with a teacher

This week we're very happy to share with you:
* See your study stats on the smart review tab

EF Hello has a brand new look. Explore the full range of shorter smart courses and choose which topics you want to study right now. With so much choice, only study what is most important to you.

We hope you're as excited as we are. Your smart courses are waiting!
